MapObjects

Class Litter

  • java.lang.Object
    • MapObjects.Interactable
      • MapObjects.Litter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Litter
extends Interactable
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class of the Litter objects that spawn periodically around the map. A subclass of Interactable
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) int imgID
      Number generated randomly that later maps to A SpriteID to paint it with.
      (package private) LitterType lType
      Enum from LitterType that represents the type of Litter this object is

      • Fields inherited from class MapObjects.Interactable

        height, width, xLocation, yLocation

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Litter()
      Constructor for all Litter objects.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
      Overridden equals method.
      int getImgID()
      Method that returns the imgID that is used to map the litter object to its Sprite in View.
      LitterType getType()
      Returns this Litter object's lType attribute that represents the kind of Litter it is.
      int hashCode()
      Overridden hashCode function that hashes the Litter object by its xLocation on the map.

      Method that sets the imgID of a Litter object that is used to map the object to an appropriate Litter Sprite in View.

      Sets this Litter object's lType attribute that represents the kind of Litter it is.

    • Field Detail

      • imgID

        int imgID
        Number generated randomly that later maps to A SpriteID to paint it with.

        Enum from LitterType that represents the type of Litter this object is

    • Constructor Detail

      • Litter

        public Litter()
        Constructor for all Litter objects. Width and height are set at 60 and the collision rectangle at 60X60

    • Method Detail

      • setImgID

        public void setImgID(int i)
        Method that sets the imgID of a Litter object that is used to map the object to an appropriate Litter Sprite in View.
        Parameters:
        i - that will represent the imgID of the Litter object in game.

      • getImgID

        public int getImgID()
        Method that returns the imgID that is used to map the litter object to its Sprite in View.
        Parameters:
        None. -
        Returns:
        The imgID of this Litter object.

      • setType

        public void setType(LitterType lt)
        Sets this Litter object's lType attribute that represents the kind of Litter it is.
        Parameters:
        lt - A value of the Enum LitterType that will represent the kind of Litter of this object.

      • getType

        public LitterType getType()
        Returns this Litter object's lType attribute that represents the kind of Litter it is.
        Parameters:
        None. -
        Returns:
        An value of the Enum LitterType

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode()
        Overridden hashCode function that hashes the Litter object by its xLocation on the map.
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        None. -
        Returns:
        The litter object's x location.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
        Overridden equals method. Two objects are considered equals such that l1.equals(l2) returns true if their x and y locations match.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        None. -
        Returns:
        true if the two Litter object coordinates match, false otherwise.
